mapper.insert: insert into orderHistory (num, userid, phone_name, phone_model_num, phone_price, phone_amount, phone_image, orderName , post1, post2, addr1, addr2, phone, paymethod) values(#{num},#{userid},#{phone_name},#{phone_model_num},#{phone_price}, #{phone_amount},#{phone_image},#{orderName},#{post1}, #{post2},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{phone},#{payMethod})
